plot: The Simpsons take a Fourth of July vacation to a cabin hotel, which cause Homer and Marge to reminisce about two episodes from their past where they stayed in the cabin.

Taking the kids for a holiday at the Kozy Kabin,the Simpsons pick up a young couple hitching,and recall two past incidents involving stays at the Kabin. Twenty years earlier they accepted a lift from the newly-wed Maude and Ned Flanders,determined to stop them from having pre-marital sex. Five years later each turned up at the Kabin on the rebound with a sexy partner who,as a result of the meeting,got married themselves. Now it's Bart and Lisa who act like a bickering couple though it inadvertently saves their parents' lives.—don @ minifie-1
